TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ListView/ColumnHeaderCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type ListView.ColumnHeaderCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 控件中列标题的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of column headers in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个类存储中显示的列标题控制何时属性设置为。A class stores the column headers that are displayed in the control when the property is set to . 存储对象以定义要如何中显示列标题的列以及显示的文本控制时显示的列。The stores objects that define the text to display for a column as well as how the column header is displayed in the control when displaying columns. 当显示列、 项和其子项显示在自己的列。When a displays columns, the items and their subitems are displayed in their own columns. 若要指定哪些列下显示子项数据，请参阅类。To specify which columns subitem data is displayed under, see the class. 有多种方法来将列标题添加到集合。There are a number of ways to add column headers to the collection. 方法向集合添加一个列标题。The method adds a single column header to the collection. 若要向集合添加多个列标题，您创建的数组对象，并将其传递给方法。To add a number of column headers to the collection, you create an array of objects and pass it to the method. 如果你想要在集合中的特定位置插入列标题，则可以使用方法。If you want to insert a column header at a specific location in the collection, you can use the method. 若要删除列标题，可以使用任一方法或方法如果你知道列标题在集合中的位置。To remove column headers, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the column header is located in the collection. 方法，可从而不是使用集合中移除所有列标题方法一次都删除一个列标题。The method allows you to remove all column headers from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single column header at a time. 除了方法和属性用于添加和删除列标题还提供了在集合中查找列标题的方法。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing column headers, the also provides methods to find column headers in the collection. 方法使您可以确定列标题是否为集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether a column header is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道列标头存储在集合中，可以使用方法，以确定列标题在集合中的位置。Once you know that the column header is located in the collection, you can use the method to determine where the column header is located in the collection. > [!NOTE] > 当所有列的总的宽度超过 32768 个像素时则会导致意外的行为。Unexpected behavior can result when the combined width of all columns exceeds 32,768 pixels. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个包含窗体项中的列时手动进行排序的控件单击控件。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为类`ListViewItemComparer`，它实现执行接口比较。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建的实例`ListViewItemComparer`并使用它来设置属性的控件。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法中调用事件处理程序使用中定义的方法`ListViewItemComparer`执行基于所单击列的项排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. [!code-cpp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CPP/listviewsort1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/CS/listviewsort1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListView.ColumnClick#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListView.ColumnClick/VB/listviewsort1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此版本的方法将添加一个现有到集合。You can use this version of the method to add an existing to the collection. 如果你想要创建一个新添加到集合时，可以使用其他版本的方法。If you want to create a new at the time you add it to the collection, you can use the other version of the method. 添加列标题时，将它们添加到集合的末尾。When column headers are added, they are added to the end of the collection. 若要插入集合中特定位置处的列标题，请使用方法。To insert a column header into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 若要将一组列标头添加到单个操作中的集合，使用方法。To add a set of column headers to the collection in a single operation, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个包含窗体项中的列时手动进行排序的控件单击控件。The following code example creates a form that contains a control that manually sorts items when a column in the control is clicked. 该示例定义一个名为类`ListViewItemComparer`，它实现执行接口比较。The example defines a class called `ListViewItemComparer` that implements the interface that performs the comparison. 该示例创建的实例`ListViewItemComparer`并使用它来设置属性的控件。The example creates an instance of `ListViewItemComparer` and uses it to set the property of the control. 方法中调用事件处理程序使用中定义的方法`ListViewItemComparer`执行基于所单击列的项排序。The method call in the event handler uses the methods defined in `ListViewItemComparer` to perform the sort of items, based on the column that is clicked. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此版本的方法来创建一个新要添加到集合。You can use this version of the method to create a new to add to the collection. 新的文本添加到该控件基于`text`参数。The text of the new added to the control is based on the `text` parameter. 此版本的方法还允许您指定的列标题中的列的宽度和文本的对齐方式。This version of the method also allows you to specify the width of the column and the alignment of text in the column header. 如果你有一个现成你想要添加到集合，使用的版本方法，它接受作为其参数。If you have an existing that you want to add to the collection, use the version of the method that accepts a as its parameter. 添加列标题时，将它们添加到集合的末尾。When column headers are added, they are added to the end of the collection. 若要插入集合中特定位置处的列标题，请使用方法。To insert a column header into the collection at a specific position, use the method. 若要将一组列标头添加到单个操作中的集合，使用方法。To add a set of column headers to the collection in a single operation, use the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 此示例需要您添加到了代码和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。This example requires that you have added the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例还需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example also requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. [!code-cpp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[ListViewExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ListViewExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密钥的比较不区分大小写。The key comparison is not case-sensitive. 如果`key`是`null`或空字符串，返回-1`.`If `key` is `null` or an empty string, returns -1`.` 中的列的键属性对应。The property corresponds to the key for a column in the . 如果项的调用，最后一个索引将首先，检查的键的匹配项，但如果没有匹配项，则搜索开始的集合的开始处返回。If is called successively, the last returned index will be checked for a key match first, and if there is no match, the search starts at the beginning of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当从集合中移除的列标题时，索引将更改后续的专栏中的标头集合。When you remove a column header from the collection, the indexes change for subsequent column headers in the collection. 删除有关已删除的列标题的所有信息。All information about the removed column header is deleted. 可以使用此方法以从集合中移除特定的列标题，通过指定的实际删除。You can use this method to remove a specific column header from the collection by specifying the actual to remove. 若要指定要删除而不是本身的列标题的列标题的索引，请使用方法。To specify the index of the column header to remove instead of the column header itself, use the method. 若要从集合中移除所有列标题，请使用方法。To remove all column headers from the collection, use the method.
